name: Go Boom! (itch)
description:
Inspired by those late nights driving down Vice City and mowing people down to the beautiful radio, play this funky fresh hip hop game about bombs. The Message by Grandmaster Flash and Furious Five has been the base for the games art style and feel with a hint of Michael Jackson's, Billie Jean.

Battle it out with these funky character down at the IGA parking lot. Get ready for a showdown.

This game was created in under five weeks for uni second year, semester one. The aim for this project was to create a F2P game based off a researched mobile game app. The main focus of my game is the one button aspect.

Credits of songs used in the game

'It's A Party!' by LoveKavi. Link:

'Graffiti Stays For Ever' by Nairo. Link:
